Reviews.Title: It is very easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Katie Barksdale "katybecca"
Reviews.Content: It is very lite weight and small. It is very easy to understand...if you have owned a Kodak camera before. All of the funtions are great for a person that doesn't want to spend over $200 dollars. The colors are great fun, if you like to be different. The anti-shake feature is great tooTakes great pictures and love the updated Kodak program that comes with it. Easily downloadable.The only thing that I didn't like was that the battery it comes with lasts about 2 days before it says it is low. Make sure you buy the adaptor with it so you can use it more than 3 days ;). The adaptor is very hard to find if you don't order it online. The stores refered me to search online for it, if that tells you anything.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Bat Ma
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic, the screen is big enough to see your pictures clearly, buttons are well-placed and respond quickly.  However, the software that comes with it does not work well with Vista.  I have had to download a couple of updates and sometimes it just doesn't respond at all and I have to come back and deal with it later.  Seems to only happen when I am trying to email pics.  Most everything has trouble with Vista though so I wasn't surprised.  The camera is great though.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: P. Anderson
Reviews.Content: My teenage son bought an M753, having investigated it.  I was thinking about buying a digital camera so I asked him why he picked this one.  Lots of features too numerous to mention here.  So I got one and love it's compact size and weight as much as the features. My teen daughter has since bought one and uses it all the time.  Also love that it takes videos.  And when my son lost his on a trip, he bought another one.  Can't say it better than that!

Reviews.Title: Not Happy Blurry Pictures
Reviews.Author: HrGlassLady "Relaxing Sisters Book Club"
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Kodak M753 camera in NOV 07 and I love the cooper color. However my camera doe snot take good pictures all the time.  Some pictures are blurry.  I miss amazing shots of my 18 month old due to this issue. I have been a kodak camera owner for the past 7 years and always very happy with my cameras. I plan to contact kodak.

Reviews.Title: TERRIFIC for people of our age
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Foote "KAMYSAVER"
Reviews.Content: We were out walking when we saw a sign on a neighbor's mailbox saying camera found,little did we know that this was the camera that we had just lost!  A mailman had picked it up by the side of the road, ( it had been run over many times but the memory stick was fine) and he gave the camera to the first house he came to, The one we picked it up from, and we got it back but we were able to order a new one from Amazon.com Thank You from the bottom of our hearts.  Karen & Bob Foote

Reviews.Title: good basic camera.
Reviews.Author: D. Skinner "DKS"
Reviews.Content: this camera is an excellent beginner/entry level camera with some better than beginner/entry level results. I bought a refurbished one and cant tell the difference between it and brand new. with the built in features it provides excellent results easily, with little to no knowledge and a little bit of experimenting.Don't be fooled into thinking that it will give as good of results as a SLR $600-$700 Camera, it wont even get close, but it is awesome for a PnS (Point-n-Shoot)

Reviews.Title: Kodak Easy Share M753
Reviews.Author: Maryneil W. Dance "MWD"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for my husband for Christmas....It is like the one I already have.  It came with everything he needed, except the wrist strap.  The seller even e-mailed me that he forgot to include it but I lost the e-mail address.  It didn't matter though as I had one on an old camera.  One slight problem was my husbands computer did not have a USB port to download his pictures, it is an older one....oh well maybe this will get him to buy a faster newer one!

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Juanita A. French
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last year. So far its the best camera I've ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Camera, extremely disappointed
Reviews.Author: A. Louria
Reviews.Content: My first digital camera I bought was a sony cybershot and it was a great camera I loved it, but when it was time to upgrade my sister in law and mother in law both recommended Kodak brand as it was great for getting shots of kids, of which I have 2. After a decent amount of research I decided on the M753, great features and a resonable price. For the first 5 months the picture quality was great you could see the smallest details on every pictures. then just before my 2nd child was born my pictures started coming out blurry.... so now I have gone back to my old sony cybershot, even tho it is old, from 2001, it still takes clearer pictures than this camera. Save your money and buy a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Great for pre-teen!
Reviews.Author: Sara Wright
Reviews.Content: After much research my husband and I bought this camera for our 12 year old son for Christmas and it has been great!  It is perfect for a kid testing the limits of responsibility and learning to use a digital camera.  As with all Kodak Easyshare cameras, there are enough features to give you the pictures you want without wasting a lot time reading the manual.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera.
Reviews.Author: Scott W. Beckerley "Scooter"
Reviews.Content: A nice, compact camera that is at a really good price. takes good pictures though there is a tendency toward red eye when subjects are photographed with the flash head on. A good camera for beginners or for having as a back-up camera, which is what I bought it for.

Reviews.Title: BLURRY PICTURES, TERRIBLE BATTERY, MOV MODE, HORRIBLE CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Daisy S "Daisy S"
Reviews.Content: June 12, 2008 The salesman did not tell me the Video part of this camera was saved in the MOV mode. The MOV mode is the APPLE (Quicktime) video. This means that when you download a movie on a Windows computer, you must have QUICKTIME loaded to play a movie you took in this camera on your PC. Not fun! Then the pictures are blurry! The worst thing is when I bought this camera, it does not take AA batteries like most do. It has a rechargeable battery which is expensive to replace. If you travel and the battery runs low, you have to go recharge it! Awful. I returned this and bought a Samsung 860 in Pink for $30 lower price. And I just love the Samsung 860 which has the AVI mode for videos so it plays in the Vista Windows Media Player and saves great to watch on a DVD on my TV.

Reviews.Title: AMAZZZING!
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Jauregui
Reviews.Content: i totally enjoyed the speed of shipping,[i ordered on a late tuesday night and i recieved it early thursday morning.] it was standard shipping too!the camera itself is a great buy.i really researched the item and made sure it was right for me,and it exceeded my expectations.it took me a little while to totally figure out the whole camera itself,but the basics are incredibly easy.the effects and editing features are great for all those no-too-professionals that love capturing fun moments with friends.terrific camera and shipping overall!!!

Reviews.Title: Good camera this is!
Reviews.Author: Hiroki Fujioka
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good for all kind of people. I love it, too. The product design is great, the speed is good, and especially, this camera support many languages! That is great! However, every products have good and bad point. This camera can't adjust the picture quality. Only we can adjust using CCD size. The maximum file size of picture is about 1Mbyte only with 7.0M CCD. That is also good point for generaly, but some people need highest quality pictures sometimes, then this camera is not enough. However, totally I can recommend this camera any other people.

ProductInfo.Features:
The KODAK AF 3X Optical Aspheric Lens captures crisp details
3X optical zoom (35 mm equivalent: 37¿111 mm) gets you closer to what's important without reducing image quality
7.0 MP means you can make stunning prints up to 20 × 30 in. (50 × 76 cm)
5X continuous digital zoom gets you even closer
View your pictures in high-definition on an HDTV or other HD device
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare M753 7 MP Digital Camera with 3xOptical Zoom (Copper)
